mapper.select: SELECT SC.SOLUTION_CASE_ID, SC.SOLUTION_CASE_TITLE, SC.SOLUTION_CASE_CONTENT, SC.SENTENCE_RESULT, L.LAWYER_NAME FROM TBL_SOLUTION_CASE SC LEFT JOIN TBL_LAWYER L ON L.LAWYER_ID = SC.LAWYER_ID ORDER BY SC.CREATE_DATE

SELECT SC.SOLUTION_CASE_ID, SC.SOLUTION_CASE_TITLE, SC.SOLUTION_CASE_CONTENT, SC.SENTENCE_RESULT, L.LAWYER_NAME, F.FIELD_TITLE, L.LAWYER_COMPANY FROM TBL_SOLUTION_CASE SC JOIN TBL_LAWYER L ON L.LAWYER_ID = SC.LAWYER_ID JOIN TBL_FIELD F ON F.FIELD_ID = SC.FIELD_ID WHERE SC.SOLUTION_CASE_ID = #{solutionCaseId}
